column4: ok what am i doing wrong, i hold ctrl-alt and left mouse.  an effect does work, but it is not a cube even though i have cube turned on in the prefs...  it's more like a page flip to the next desktop...  i can turn the desktop around as slow and as fast as i want with left mouse held, but there is no cube.
does anybody have knowledge on how to get the cube working please?
apparently compiz is only doing two viewports, which is why it's more like a spinning panel rather than a cube
